questions.subject: Humanities(Social_Studies)
questions.question: Study Source A. Does the cartoonist approve of Singapore‟s transformation to a cashless society? Explain your answer, using details of the cartoon.

questions.subject: Humanities(Social_Studies)
questions.question: Study Source B. Why did the PM Lee make this statement? Explain your answer.

questions.subject: Humanities(Social_Studies)
questions.question: Study Sources C and D. How far would Source C agree with Source D? Explain your answer.

questions.subject: Humanities(Social_Studies)
questions.question: Study Source E. How useful is Source E as evidence of the impact of disruptive technology? Explain your answer.

questions.subject: Humanities(Social_Studies)
questions.question: "Singapore‟s move towards adopting disruptive technologies brings about benefits." Using sources in this case study, explain how far you would agree with this statement.

questions.subject: Humanities(Social_Studies)
questions.question: Extract 1 shows how the internet has changed our lives. In your opinion, explain how the internet has changed our lives in Singapore. Explain your answer using two consequences.

questions.subject: Humanities(Social_Studies)
questions.question: Extract 2 and Extract 3 reflect on the hybridisation and homogenisation of culture. Do you think hybridisation has a greater impact on culture in societies  than homogenisation? Explain your answer.
